  totalProductInStock = this.products.filter((p) => p.is_in_inventory === true)
    .length;
  totalOutOfStock = this.totalProductCount - this.totalProductInStock;

  selectedFilterRadioButton: string = 'all';

  @Input()

  onFilterChanged(event: string) {

<app-filter
  [all]="totalProductCount"
  [inStock]="totalProductInStock"
  [outOfStock]="totalOutOfStock"
  (selectedFilterRadioButtonChanged)="onFilterChanged($event)"
></app-filter>

<div class="ekart--product-container">
  <div *ngFor="let p of products">
    <app-product
      [product]="p"
      *ngIf="searchText === '' || p.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchText)"
    ></app-product>
  </div>
</div>
